abstract: Two Chinese banks said Friday that they would need to raise money to meet new capital requirements, as lenders try to buffer their balance sheets against risk.
snippet: Two Chinese banks said Friday that they would need to raise money to meet new capital requirements, as lenders try to buffer their balance sheets against risk.
lead_paragraph: Two Chinese banks said Friday that they would need to raise money to meet new capital requirements, as the lenders look to buffer their balance sheets against risk.

headline.main: China Banks Seek Funds to Pad Capital Ratio

abstract: As the securities business booms in China, the country’s government is cracking down on inexperienced reporters who cover the markets.
snippet: As the securities business booms in China, the country’s government is cracking down on inexperienced reporters who cover the markets.
lead_paragraph: As the securities business booms in China, the country’s government is cracking down on inexperienced reporters who cover the markets.

headline.main: China Blocks Novice Reporters From Covering Stocks
